member.name: T:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.ExAlterSequenceRestartWithIsNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ALTER SEQUENCE RESTART WITH is not supported.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.ExInvalidBooleanStringX
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid boolean string '{0}'.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.ExOracleBelow9i2IsNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oracle below 9i2 is not supported..

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.ExOracleDoesNotSupportLocalTemporaryTables
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oracle does not support local temporary tables.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.ExOracleDoesNotSupportTrimmingMoreThatOneCharacterAtOnce
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oracle does not support trimming more that one character at once.

member.name: P:Xtensive.Sql.Oracle.Resources.Strings.ExOracleDoesNotSupportUpdateFromStatements
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Oracle does not support UPDATE FROM statements.
